experience.title: Professional
experience.subtitle: My journey through various roles and the impact I've made along the way

items.title: Senior Software Engineer
items.description: Engineering and maintaining a high-volume travel booking platform using Next.js, React.js, and Node.js BFF, while building and integrating Java Spring Boot microservices to support business-critical modules across flights, hotels, and cars.
achievements: Improved navigation performance by 30% through React component refactoring
Reduced unnecessary re-renders by 25% for scalability
Optimized backend API aggregation, cutting data latency by 20%
Collaborated with product teams to deliver UX and workflow improvements

items.title: Senior Backend Developer
items.description: Developed and optimized backend services using Java (Spring Boot) with a focus on real-time features and system stability.
achievements: Improved real-time system efficiency by 35% with optimized WebSocket handling
Refactored legacy code into modular services for maintainability
Reduced downtime by resolving critical legacy bottlenecks

items.title: Software Engineer (Full-Stack)
items.description: Built and deployed HR & Accounting systems with React.js and Node.js, integrating automation to improve organizational workflows.
achievements: Increased HR productivity by 30% via system automation
Reduced attendance errors by 40% with QR code attendance system
Boosted app response time by 25% by fixing N+1 queries

items.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
items.description: Delivered custom business solutions for clients, focusing on dashboards, CRM tools, and stock management systems.
achievements: Designed inventory, order, and reporting dashboards
Implemented role-based access for security and scalability
Built analytics dashboards enabling data-driven decisions
